ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: Shows whether the Software Management function is in a state of readiness to execute actions. The Managed Element sets it to wait during any operations and maintenance activity that causes one or more of the Software Management function related actions to become unavailable. The Management System should wait until the state returns to capable before invoking any Software Management action.

ns2:member.name: capable
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The Software Management function is in a state where it is capable to execute all actions.

ns2:member.name: wait
ns2:member.ns2:desc: The Software Management function is in a state where some actions are unavailable.
